title: 이달의소녀탐구 #398 (LOONA TV #398)
members: GoWon, Chuu, Yves, Choerry, JinSoul, YeoJin, HaSeul, HyunJin
summary:
0:02 -- Choerry’s episode of Woomanna was released just before this episode. She
makes everyone watch it together.
0:12 -- They are all watching it together
0:22 -- After watching the episode, HyunJin feels that Choerry should continue acting.
“Just put singing aside and pursue acting.” (Savage!)
0:31 -- Choerry says some lines from the show and starts talking like an actor.
0:43 -- GoWon mentions that Choerry should act a little shy and they both start acting.
0:55 -- They both hide behind flowers. “Peek-a-Boo”
